rules.rule: If The Policy Holder Age Of 'the Policy' < 25 THEN Set The Premium Amount Of 'the Policy' To Premium Value Of 'the Policy'
rules.explanation: If The Person Is Young(Below 25), They Get A Lower Premium Rate Of 5%

rules.ruleName: Policy Holder Age Less Than 25 And 50
rules.rule: If The Policy Holder Age Of 'the Policy' < 25 THEN Set The Premium Amount Of 'the Policy' To Premium Value Of 'the Policy'
rules.explanation: If The Person Is Young(Below 25), They Get A Lower Premium Rate Of 6%
